idInfo.baby: Infants under 2: Only name + DOB. If flying, birth certificate required.
idInfo.child: Children 2-12: ID not required. If flying, birth certificate required.
idInfo.teen: Children 14-16: May have ID but not required. If flying, birth certificate required.
idInfo.adult: Adults under 14: ID not required. If flying, birth certificate required.

fields.deadlineNotice: This tour requires {{days}} days for processing, please select a departure date after {{minDate}}

errors.dateInPast: Departure date cannot be in the past
errors.dateBeforeDeadline: Departure date must be at least {{days}} day(s) from today

errors.dateOverOneMonth: Departure date must be within 1 month
errors.fullNameInvalid: Full name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
errors.dobInFuture: Date of birth cannot be in the future
errors.dobTooOld: Invalid date of birth (age must be ≤ 120)
errors.adultTooYoung: Adult must be ≥ 12 years old in the Adult section.
errors.representativeTooYoung: Representative must be ≥ 18 years old in the Representative section.
errors.childTooYoung: Child must be ≥ 2 years old in the Children section.
errors.childTooOld: Child must be < 12 years old in the Children section.
errors.infantTooOld: Infant must be < 2 years old in the Infant section.

validation.vietnameseId: Vietnamese ID must be 12 digits (CCCD) or 9 digits (CMND/CMT)
validation.passport: Passport number must be 6-9 characters (letters and numbers)

errors.idCardRecognition:
Cannot recognize ID card in image. Please ensure:
1) ID card image is clear, not blurry
2) Not obscured or cropped
3) Real photo (not screenshot)
4) Sufficient lighting, no glare
5) ID card must be intact, not torn

box.title: KDBS Assistant
box.greeting: Hello! I'm KDBS Assistant. How can I help you today?
box.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.

empty.selectUser: Select a user to start chatting

hero.title: Tour Management Studio for Korea × Da Nang
hero.subtitle: A pastel platform that helps teams coordinate bookings, manage tours, handle payments, and care for Korean guests right in Da Nang – intuitive, minimal yet technology-rich.

mission.title: Tour Booking Operating System
mission.description: We build a bilingual Korean-Vietnamese tour management platform that helps businesses in Da Nang operate bookings, coordinate partners, and care for Korean guests in an intuitive, tech-driven way following soft minimal standards.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: Shaping soft experiences with thin icons, pastel palette, and spacious layouts.

quality.title: Booking OS
quality.desc: Coordinate tour bookings, vouchers, and payment status on a pastel plane.

trust.title: Compliance Center
trust.desc: Track visas, contracts, Korean partner SLAs with realtime alerts.

excellence.title: Seoul × Da Nang Link
excellence.desc: Sync Korean partners, local suppliers, and multilingual schedules.

passion.title: Care Automation
passion.desc: Korean guest care playbook, follow-up schedules, and experience reminders.

member2.name: Trần Thị B
member2.desc: Shaping visual and emotional soft experiences.

member3.name: Lê Văn C
member3.desc: Standardizing balanced, lean guest care processes.

start.title: Starting from Seoul
start.desc: Connecting the first Korean experts with the Da Nang-loving community.

expand.title: Minimal identity
expand.desc: Applying Korean living arts to redesign emotionally caring tours.

partnership.title: International standard partners
partnership.desc: Partnering with accommodation chains and high-tech spas for relaxation journeys.

future.title: Experience Studio
future.desc: Launching a Korean-inspired studio in Da Nang with interactive technology.

workflow.caption: Korean - Da Nang tour operation cycle
workflow.capture.detail: Zalo, KakaoTalk, web booking forms sync to Korean-Vietnamese CRM.
workflow.design.detail: Select tour templates, apply vouchers, calculate KRW ↔︎ VND prices instantly.
workflow.coordinate.detail: Push alerts to hotels, vehicles, guides with bilingual checklists.
workflow.care.detail: Track Korean guest emotions, automatically generate reports for partners.

story.title: Soft Narrative
story.paragraph1: KDBS was born from Minimal Soft Korean inspiration – where slow pace, white light, and rounded materials create peace of mind. Each tour is edited like a harmony with the rhythm of technology and nature.
story.paragraph2: We prioritize mental wellness in every step: from herbal spa, sea breathing meditation, to extended reality experiences that preserve emotions. Technology is just the backdrop, your emotions are the center.
story.paragraph3: Let us help you reach the most peaceful version of yourself in the heart of Da Nang.

hero.title: We listen to every rhythm of your emotions
hero.subtitle: Connect with the studio in a minimal, pastel, soft-rounded style – so every Korea × Da Nang journey is delicately cared for.

moments.one: Design soft itineraries for Korean groups
moments.three: Activate emotional care team in Da Nang

form.title: Send a pastel message
form.subtitle: We respond gently within 12 hours, with suggestions that match your vibe.
form.name: Full name

visit.title: Schedule a private appointment with the studio
visit.subtitle: Warm pastel space with herbal tea, Korean mood board, and glowing booking coordination desk.
visit.flowCopy: 15 minutes listening, 20 minutes vibe coordination, 5 minutes finalizing journey.
